decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of the decision notice. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Location PlanBlock Plan GDP299/HP1 Rev AGDP299/HP2GDP299/HP3GDP299/HP4 Rev AGDP299/HP5 Rev AGDP299/HP6 Rev AGDP299/HP7 Rev AReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

All new external work shall be carried out in materials that match the existing or as specified in the approved application.Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.

The glazing serving the first floor side elevation of the development indicated on drawing Nos. GDP299/HP4 Rev A and GDP299/HP5 Rev A, shall be fixed shut 1.7m above floor level and in obscured glass with an equivalent obscuration as level 3 on the Pilkington Obscuration Range. The glazing shall not be altered without the approval in writing of the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To safeguard the privacy of the occupiers of adjoining and neighbouring properties.
description: Part single storey part two storey side extension, part single storey part two storey rear extension and front porch.
